name: Shao Kahn
title: The Konqueror
subtitle: A ruthless emperor who crushes his enemies with overwhelming force and dominance
lore: The supreme ruler of Outworld, Shao Kahn is a being of immense power and cruelty. With his massive warhammer and imposing presence, he dominates the battlefield through sheer force and intimidation. His unquenchable thirst for conquest has led him to absorb countless realms into his empire, and his magical abilities allow him to enhance his already formidable physical strength. Those who face Shao Kahn must contend not only with his devastating hammer strikes but also his tactical brilliance and unwavering determination to rule all realms.

passive.name: Emperor's Might
passive.description: Buffs on Shao Kahn have doubled duration time.

Q.name: Hammer Smash
Q.description: Shao Kahn smashes the ground with his hammer close to himself in a circle. Enemies in the area take [80/125/225/400/555 + (50%AD)] damage and are stunned for [1.2s].

W.name: Hornbutt
W.description: Shao Kahn charges forward with [55%] increased movement speed. The first enemy hit by the charge takes [200%AD] damage and is stunned for [1s]. If the ability hits an enemy, Shao Kahn gains [10% damage reduction] for 5s.

E.name: Emperor's Shield
E.description: Shao Kahn gains [30% MaxHP] shield for himself and can't be CC-d for [5s]. If the shield expires, he gains 20%AD for 5s.

R.name: Swirling Hammer
R.description: Shao Kahn spins around with his hammer for maximum of [3s]. The range of the ability depends on the spinning time. He throws the hammer in the targeted direction, hitting the first enemy and every other enemy near that and stunning them for 1s, reducing their damage reduction by [10%] and dealing [355/500/600 + 100%AD] damage to them.

1.name: Conqueror's Strength
1.description: Quest: Hit 15 enemy champions with Hammer Smash -> Reward: Hammer Smash deals 15% more damage.

1.name: Unstoppable Force
1.description: Quest: Stun 10 enemy champions with Hornbutt -> Reward: Hornbutt's damage reduction is increased to 15% and lasts 2s longer.

1.name: Emperor's Resilience
1.description: Quest: Absorb 10,000 damage with Emperor's Shield -> Reward: Emperor's Shield grants 10% more shield.

5.name: Brutal Strikes
5.description: Shao Kahn's basic attacks slow enemies by 20% for 1.5s.

5.name: Warlord's Fury
5.description: After using an ability, Shao Kahn's next basic attack deals 15% more damage.

5.name: Tactical Advance
5.description: Hornbutt's cooldown is reduced by 2s if it hits an enemy champion.

10.name: Hammer Mastery
10.description: Swirling Hammer's stun duration is increased to 1.5s and the damage reduction debuff is increased to 15%.

10.name: Soul Stealer
10.description: When Shao Kahn damages an enemy champion with an ability, he heals for 3% of his maximum health.

15.name: Overwhelming Presence
15.description: Enemies near Shao Kahn deal 8% less damage.

15.name: Merciless Assault
15.description: Item: Upon activation, Shao Kahn's next ability deals 25% more damage. [45s cd]

15.name: Outworld Protection
15.description: Item: Upon activation, Shao Kahn gains a shield equal to 15% of his maximum health. [60s cd]

20.name: Emperor's Command
20.description: Swirling Hammer now applies a 40% slow for 2s to all enemies hit.

20.name: Immortal Ruler
20.description: Shao Kahn gains 15% more maximum health.

20.name: Konqueror's Might
20.description: Shao Kahn's passive now also increases the effectiveness of buffs by 20%.

20.name: Wrath of Kahn
20.description: When below 30% health, Shao Kahn gains 25% damage reduction for 5s. This effect can only trigger once every 60s.
